```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
```


```{r}
#| label: main-plot
connectedness |>
  ggplot(aes(x = population, y = connectedness)) +
  scale_x_log10(labels = scales::comma_format()) + 
  geom_point()
```
